abstract: Vice Pres Joseph R Biden Jr and other top Obama administration officials criticize China during bilateral meeting for sponsoring online attacks against businesses; stop short of mentioning China's suspected role in theft of personal data on millions of federal employees and contractors.
lead_paragraph: Top officials meeting with Chinese aides in Washington complained about online attacks on business but kept quiet about the hacking of federal employees’ data.

headline.main: U.S. Scolds China for Online Attacks
headline.print_headline: U.S. Scolds China for Online Attacks

snippet: Top officials meeting with Chinese aides in Washington complained about online attacks on business but kept quiet about the hacking of federal employees’ data.
